name: Allegory of the Cave
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2016. The theme was "Rituals".

Description:

Your eyes can only see shadows but your tribe's existence depends on you to save them from what can't be seen. Try to look beyond the shadow on the wall and finish the rituals by rearranging the tiles to the patterns drawn by your ancestors.

Controls:

  • Use Keys 1 to 9 to choose level.
  • Use arrows in game to control the character.
  • Press Esc in a level to go back the the menu.

Note:

The scene below is the shadows on the wall as seen by the eye in the middle where the two middle columns above the eye are the two middle columns on the wall.

Tools used:

  • Atom
  • Phaser
  • SketchBook (Android)
  • Gimp
  • Mongoose Free Edition
